archimate:Constraint.name: NFR002: The solution operational model need to be structured in 5 operational environments
archimate:Constraint.documentation: In operational and DevOps processes definition need to be defined 4 operational environments: - Development (not in DR or HA) - Functional Test (not in DR but in HA) - Certification (in DR and in HA/BC) with a topology equal to production and a scale factor between 33% and 50% - Production (in DR and HA/BC) - DR (in HA) that mirror Production environment
